mapper.select: /* USE : BrandTerminalMapper.getVendorList */ SELECT VAN_FG , VAN_CD AS VALUE , VAN_NM AS NAME FROM TB_CM_VAN_CMPNY WHERE VAN_FG = '04' AND VAN_CD != '009' ORDER BY VAN_FG, VAN_CD

/* BrandTerminalMapper.getTerminalList */ SELECT HQ_OFFICE_CD , HQ_BRAND_CD , VENDOR_FG , (SELECT NMCODE_NM FROM TB_CM_NMCODE WHERE NMCODE_GRP_CD = '078' AND NMCODE_CD = VENDOR_FG ) AS VENDOR_FG_NM , VENDOR_CD , VENDOR_NM , VENDOR_TERMNL_NO , VENDOR_SER_NO FROM TB_HQ_BRAND_TERMNL WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND HQ_BRAND_CD = #{hqBrandCd}
mapper.update: /* BrandTerminalMapper.updateTerminalEnvst */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_STORE_ENVST tmse USING DUAL ON ( tmse.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tmse.ENVST_CD = #{envstCd} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET ENVST_VAL = #{envstVal}, MOD_DT = #{modDt}, MOD_ID = #{modId} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( STORE_CD, ENVST_CD, ENVST_VAL, DIRCT_IN_YN, USE_YN, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{storeCd}, #{envstCd}, #{envstVal}, 'N', 'Y', #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )
